SEARCH
Package app.entity

Class Player

java.lang.Object
app.entity.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
BotPlayer, HumanPlayer
public abstract class Player extends Object
This class contains the skeleton that will be common between HumanPlayer and BotPlayer It holds 1 abstract method, which is takeTurn()

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(Deck deck, String name)
      Player constructor, called by BotPlayer or HumanPlayer. Cannot be directly initialised.
      Parameters:
      deck - The shuffled instance of deck that everyone will be using that game
      name - The name of the player (Either entered by human player or insert default bot name)

  • Method Details

    • getPlayerHand

      public ArrayList<Card> getPlayerHand()
      PlayerHand getter
      Returns:
      Returns the player's current hand

    • getCollectedParadeCards

      public ArrayList<Card> getCollectedParadeCards()
      Player's collected parade pool cards
      Returns:
      Returns the cards that player has collected from the parade

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Player Name getter
      Returns:
      Returns the player's name

    • hasSixColors

      public boolean hasSixColors()
      Uses a hashmap to check if the player instance has cards of the 6 colors in his collected parade pool. If true, this will trigger game end final round.
      Returns:
      returns true of player has 6 colors in his parade

    • obtainPlayerColourCounts

      public ArrayList<Integer> obtainPlayerColourCounts(ArrayList<Card> playerHand)
      Returns the number of cards of a certain color that the player has in his hand
      Parameters:
      playerHand - The hand to count the colors for
      Returns:
      colourCount Returns an ArrayList of type Integer with the card counts in order of "Red", "Blue", "Purple", "Green", "Black", "Yellow"

    • countNumOfColouredCards

      public int countNumOfColouredCards(String colour)
      Returns the number of cards of color X that the player has in his collected parade cards
      Parameters:
      colour - The color of which you want to find the number of cards for
      Returns:
      count The number of cards of that color

    • emptyHandToScoringArea

      public void emptyHandToScoringArea()
      This method is used for the final round only. This method will add a card to the player's collected parade card pool if the player has cards remaining

    • collectEligibleCardsFromParade

      public void collectEligibleCardsFromParade(Parade parade, Card playedCard)
      This method collects eligible cards from the parade, which is dependent on the card the player has played
      Parameters:
      parade - The common parade that everyone is using
      playedCard - The card the player plays, which determines what cards he draws, if any

    • takeTurn

      public abstract void takeTurn(Game game, Card playedCard)
      Abstract method to be implemented differently for BotPlayer and HumanPlayer
      Parameters:
      game - Takes in an instance of the current game
      playedCard - The card that the player/bot plays
